# Problem 1 

Import the NYC Transit data

```{r}
trans_df = 
  read_csv("data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv", na = c("NA", "",".")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  mutate(
    entry = case_match(
      entry,
      "YES" ~ 1,
      "NO" ~ 0
    )
  )
```
